mapper.select: select a.id, a.title, a.price, a.lesson_num as lessonNum, a.cover, b.description, c.name as teacherName, d.title as subjectLevelOne, e.title as subjectLevelTwo from edu_course a left join edu_course_description b on a.id=b.id left join edu_teacher c on a.teacher_id=c.id left join edu_subject d on a.subject_parent_id=d.id left join edu_subject e on a.subject_id=e.id where a.id = #{courseId}
